page.title: 16DOUNBY CHILDREN: TV PROGS.
page.content: {"Auf Wiedersehen, Pet" This programme is about seven men working on a building site in Germany. They are from Liverpool and I like their accents. It is funny and I like the way things work out for them. {"Dogtanian and the Three Muskehounds" {(cartoon) I like "Dogtanian" because it has good characters. It is about their life in France protecting the Queen's jewels. I like the mouse which makes plans that never work and the Muske which shouts "All for one, and one for all!" {"The Young Ones" This is a comedy about four men who live in an old battered house; Rick, Mike, Neil and Vivian. They do silly things like putting the hamster in the toaster and fixing a bomb to the doorbell so that they can hear it.
